name: Super Secret Bomb Mascarade
description:
A game about finding and eliminating the target and getting out safely as fast as possible!

Super Secret Bomb Mascarade is a game made for the 40hour game jam with the themes "10seconds" and "Escape". 

This is made by only my me and my friend, we hope you enyoy :)

Do not be scared to write comments! I will answer and adressas as many as possible.

Forgot to clarify! After giving the bomb to the target, you have to escape by running to the left side before the bomb explodes!
